actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on the need for accurate guidelines for breast cancer screening for women ages 40-49, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress concerning: (1) the need for adequate studies on breast cancer screenings for women between the ages of 40 and 49; and (2) the National Cancer Institute's statement and guidelines regarding such screenings.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on the need for accurate guidelines for breast cancer screening for women ages 40-49, and for other purposes.
